remarks: Lemma for opsqri .  (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
opsqrlem1.1 $e |- T e. HrmOp $.
opsqrlem1.2 $e |- ( normop ` T ) e. RR $.
opsqrlem1.3 $e |- 0hop <_op T $.
opsqrlem1.4 $e |- R = ( ( 1 / ( normop ` T ) ) .op T ) $.
opsqrlem1.5 $e |- ( T =/= 0hop -> E. u e. HrmOp ( 0hop <_op u /\ ( u o. u ) = R ) ) $.
opsqrlem1 $p |- ( T =/= 0hop -> E. v e. HrmOp ( 0hop <_op v /\ ( v o. v ) = T ) ) $.
$d T u v $.
